name: We Would Never Sell a Comrade to an Enemy!!!

trigger.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

text: Main: You may rest 2 of your Characters: None of your Characters can be K.O.'d by your opponent's effects until the end of your opponent's next turn. Trigger: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may rest 2 of your Characters: None of your Characters can be K.O.'d by your opponent's effects until the end of your opponent's next turn.
Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
